channel.title: Disability on Tinu Alikor
channel.description: Recent content in Disability on Tinu Alikor

item.title: We’re all equal in the sky…

image.title: We’re all equal in the sky…

item.description: So my most recent flight from Switzerland to London has taken me awhile to recover from. I am a seasoned traveller who isn’t easily flustered. I plan my route, prepare my luggage and get going! Saying this being a black female, with mobility issues travelling with a toddler whilst pregnant puts a slightly different spin on the situation and its this I’d like to share. I’m always trying to do it all, juggling, balancing plates on my head whilst spinning wheels in my palms…I’m the consummate multi tasker.
